content: I’m Subu Chitti, a programmer. Over the weekend I started doing the natural number game and haven’t had so much fun in a long time. I’ve installed lean now and would like to immerse myself in proving maths theorems using lean. Dream would be to join a collaborative effort to prove something, that’s the goal I’d like to reach
Are you aware of the current ongoing community projects? And, of course, you can contribute to Mathlib
Welcome! And yes, NNG is a good sample of how addictive Lean can be. You've been warned :wink:

Thanks Daniel, I wasn't aware of those projects.

@Kevin Buzzard I have a Bachelors in computer science and and have taken a few undergraduate maths courses and discrete maths.

Johan, can't wait to try out the other games on the same page
